alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Diego County Inland Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 19 at 9:33PM PDT until March 21 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 50 to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire and San Diego County Valleys. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Strong winds could damage trees and other objects. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Diego County Inland Valleys
